p: It is interesting to note that at the highest dose assayed, turmeric essential oil was able to significantly reduce the hypocotyl development of P. oleracea ( Table 3) as well as both the hypocotyl and radicle growth of L. multiflorum, E. crus-galli, C. selloana, and N. glauca, without the phytotoxic effects shown by other essential oils such as rosemary ( Rosmarinus officinalis L.), winter savory ( Satureja hortensis L.), and bay ( Laurus nobilis L.) in tomato [ 58].
